mapper.select: select u.user_no as user_no, u.log_name as user_name, u.cert_no as cert_no, u.mobile_tel as mobile_tel, u.email as email, u.status as status, u.remark as remark, u.updated_date as updated_date, u.updated_by as updated_by, u.organ_no as organ_department_no, r.role_name as role_name, r.role_no as role_no, ob1.organ_name as organ_department_name, ob2.organ_name as organ_company_name, ob2.organ_no as organ_company_no from (SELECT * from IFDP_SYS_USER_BASE where FIND_IN_SET(organ_no,queryParentOrganInfo(#{userNo}))) u left outer join IFDP_SYS_REL_USER_ROLE ur on u.user_no = ur.user_no left outer join IFDP_SYS_ROLE r on r.role_no = ur.role_no left outer join IFDP_SYS_ORGAN_BASE ob1 on ob1.organ_no = u.organ_no left outer join IFDP_SYS_ORGAN_BASE ob2 on ob2.organ_no in (SELECT organ_no from IFDP_SYS_ORGAN_BASE where FIND_IN_SET(organ_no,queryBelongOrganByUserNo(u.user_no))) where u.status !=1 and u.uid = #{uid}
